title: NEET UG paper leak probe: CBI arrests chairman of Jay Jalaram Schools in Gujarat
selftext: In its remand application, the CBI has said that Dixit Patel, the chairman of the Jay Jalaram Schools, is suspected of "being in touch with the accused, who have been earlier in the case, and was in the know" of the malpractice.
